page.title: 18Scunthorpe Community Dentist
page.content: Mr Fallon is a{Senior Dental Officer, and he is the only one at the{Ashby {Health Centre}in Scunthorpe. His priorities are{schools, pre-schools and{handicapped children. He sees from 25 to 75 patients a day. He visits 26 schools a year and says these examinations are generally followed up by the parents. People attend the clinic regularly. According to Mr Fallon, children's teeth in this area are generally very healthy. This is mainly due to the {fluoridated water}in the area. Mr Fallon thinks the clinic is better than it was five years ago, but he could still do with more equipment. He also feels that another full-time dentist would be a good idea.
